The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 February is 3,516,998 (6,248.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 February, there were 105,971 new confirmed cases (188.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 January, there were 145,365 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 27% (39,394 fewer cases).
